description:
Henrietta de Tristain is the Queen of Tristain. She is loved by her nationals and is also an old friend of Louise. She defends Tristain from the Albion invasion after the assassination of the Albion prince. Henrietta was in love with Wales and was devastated over his death. This was later used against her in a kidnapping attempt. She had developed an attraction towards Saito over the course of the first two seasons, and in season three, her feelings are growing deeper, becoming Saito`s third love interest after Louise and Siesta.
She appears to be named for Princess Henrietta-Anne Stuart (1644-1670), sister of Charles II of England, wife of Philippe d`Orleans (younger brother of Louis XIV).
name: Henrietta de Tristain
